## GerstnerWaveGenerator.isOmniWave() method

Query if the wave is an omni-directional wave.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isOmniWave(waveIndex: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  waveIndex | number | index of the wave to set. |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the wave is an omni-directional wave, false otherwise.
